Hint: With #brc420, you can create a single song, an mp3/mp4, and inscribe it onto #Ordinals. Through recursive inscription, you can sell 100,000 copies at any price you choose, enabling secondary market trading.

@elonmusk once joked about selling "this song about NFTs" as anâ€¦ https://t.co/FGZhkqftOK

quoted_tweet.text: The answer is BRC-420, apparently. I looked at the BRC-420 spec, and it doesn't seem to mention making inscriptions with /content/ID in the body. Does anyone know where the spec for this is?
